original_text: Its side rooms, its jambs, and its vestibule were of the same size as the others, and both it and its vestibule had windows all around. Its length was fifty cubits, and its breadth twenty-five cubits.
korean_text: 길이가 쉰 척이요 너비가 스물다섯 척이며 그 문지기 방과 벽과 현관이 먼저 측량한 것과 같고 그 문간과 그 현관 좌우에도 창이 있으며

sentences.original_text: Its side rooms, its jambs, and its vestibule were of the same size as the others
sentences.korean_translation: 그 곁방들, 문설주, 그리고 현관은 다른 것들과 같은 크기였습니다.

sentences.original_text: both it and its vestibule had windows all around
sentences.korean_translation: 그것과 그 현관 둘 다 사방에 창이 있었습니다.
